title: Taliban tell Afghan women to stay home from work because soldiers are 'not trained' to respect them
content:
1. Taliban tell Afghan women to stay home from work because soldiers are 'not trained' to respect them  CNN
  2. Evacuation flights out of Kabul are picking up. Here's what it's like at the airport.  CNN
  3. Poland stops evacuations from Kabul airport amid safety concerns | TheHill  The Hill
  4. Opinion | The Afghan Army Collapsed Against the Taliban. Here’s Why.  The New York Times
  5. Opinion | The U.S. dare not betray the students at the American University of Afghanistan  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 兵士が女性を尊重する訓練を受けていないので、女性は家で仕事をするようにとタリバンが指示。
塔利班告诉阿富汗妇女不要外出工作，因为士兵们 "没有接受过尊重她们的训练"。
塔利班告訴阿富汗婦女不要外出工作，因爲士兵們 "沒有接受過尊重她們的訓練"。
